feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model
feed.subtitle: ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Aggregation in RAP Custom Entity (Unmanaged Query) for Fiori List Report
entry.content:
I am working on a complex custom logic report that cannot be achieved using the standard CDS-based approach. Therefore, I decided to implement it using a RAP Custom Entity ‚Äì Unmanaged Query and display the results in a Fiori List Report.

In this List Report, I need to show totals and subtotals for certain amount columns. I tried adding annotations such as:

@OData.applySupportedForAggregation: #FULL
@Aggregation.default: #SUM

However, since this is a Custom Entity, aggregation annotations are not allowed.

I understand that I can implement aggregation logic directly in the query class select method, but for this to work the aggregation request must be triggered from the frontend UI. At the moment, this request is not being sent.

üëâ My questions are:

  • How can aggregation be enabled when creating a RAP-based Fiori List Report with a Custom Entity?
  • Is this feasible at all with Custom Entities, or do we need to handle it differently (e.g., via frontend UI extensions)?

Any guidance or best practices would be greatly appreciated. 

@Andre_Fischer

entry.title: Navigation not appearing in page map for a Custom Page as main entry page
entry.content:
I am trying to build a custom fiori app based on SAP Fiori Elements and Flexible Programming Model. I used 'Custom Page' template from SAP Fiori Generator wizard in BAS. Added a filter bar and a table in the entry page Main.view.xml

<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:macros="sap.fe.macros"
    xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" controllerName="com.udhg.zprojectmanage.ext.main.Main">
    <Page id="Main" title="{i18n>MainTitle}">
        <content>
        <VBox id="vBox">
		<macros:FilterBar metaPath="/ZC_PROJECT_INFO/@com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.SelectionFields" id="FilterBar" />
		<macros:Table metaPath="/ZC_PROJECT_INFO/@com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.LineItem" id="LineItemTable" filterBar="FilterBar" initialLoad="false" rowPress="onPressRow" type="GridTable"/>
	</VBox>
        </content>
    </Page>
</mvc:View>

In the 'Page Map', however, when I am trying to add a custom page I cannot see any option to select in navigation dropdown:

I want to add internal navigation to the same entity context 

ZC_PROJECT_INFO when a row is clicked on the table of the main page.
I understand this works with a CAP OData service where I see a navigation property to the same entity, e.g., below metadata

 

But my custom app is based on an ABAP RAP OData service which does not have such a navigation to self. Is this a limitation in SAP Fiori Tools or am I missing something?

 

Best regards,
Sumit

entry.title: Update a Custom Business Partner Field Using a Custom Program
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We have enhanced the business partner master data with new field using the 'Custom Fields' app and have enabled the new custom field usage for I_Businesspartner.

Now we have to update this custom field using a RAP action. How to achieve this ? 

Thank you!

Regards,

Karthik

entry.title: 2508 Embedded Steampunk: How can we create Data Provider of form object based on RAP custom app
entry.content:
Hi,

According to the 2508 Embedded Steampunk, there is new feature to create form template in the form object of ABAP Development Tools (ADT) itself.

So, I want to create a form template based on a RAP custom app that is created by Eclipse ADT.

My development steps of RAP custom app are as follow.

1. Database table

2. Data Definition and Projection View

3. Metadata Extension

4. Behavior Definition of both Data Definition and Projection View

5. Service Definition

6. Service Binding with Odata V2 - UI

7. Form Object

 

But after creating custom app, no Data Provider is not available to choose in Form Object.

And, I can‚Äôt continue the development because of this step.

 

So, if you have any idea or any experience about this, could you please share with me how can we continue to proceed?

If you have any helpful documentation or blog posts about it, I‚Äôd appreciate it if you could share them with me.

 

Thank You.

Best Regards,

Aye Chan

entry.title: SAP RAP Fiori Freestyle Custom page cannot detect onExit
entry.content:
I'm currently working on an SAP RAP where the user can go from a List Report to a custom page. This custom page is using a Fiori Freestyle and it's mainly for filling in with custom data. I'm not using Form Entry Object Page because this is using custom entity and draft entity is not going to be used in this scenario.

The problem here is that if I were to provide input in the custom page, go back, and select another item, the data doesn't change. It stays the same and I don't know why. Does anyone have a solution to this problem?

entry.title: Collaborative Draft with 3 Layers
entry.content:
Hi,

I have my business object developed in RAP with three layers: the base layer R_ (managed implementation), the interface layer I_ (interface) and the consumption lauer C_ (projection). Now I want to enable collaborative draft on C_ layer. I managed to enable collaborative draft on R_ layer by adding draft query to the draft table, action Share and statement on the top. I also enabled collaborative draft on I_ layer with "use collaborative draft;" + action Share. This does not cause any issues. But when I try to do the same thing on C_ layer, I get this error message:

To use "collaborative draft", base entity "I_<entity>" must define a "query" view for draft table "<draft table>".

I don't understand why this error is being raise. The base entity is not I_<entity> but R_<entity> where I have the query defined for the draft table. I got this error message when I did not have query defined on R_ level. But why is this being raised when activating C_ layer? Is it possible to enable collaborative draft when consumption layer is on top of interface layer?

I checked documentation for collaborative draft and it has the following message: "In case you have used an interface layer, you must also use the statement there." Based on this statement I assume that this should be supported. I also checked limitations of RAP but nothing is documented there regarding this. The SFLIGHT demo seems to be using only two layers.

Thanks

entry.title: How to create Material Document using BO interface in ADT for S4 HANA public cloud system
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am trying to create a Material Document in an S/4HANA Public Cloud system using the BO interface I_MaterialDocumentTP in ADT.
However, the material document is not getting created, and I am not able to identify what might be missing in my implementation.

Could anyone please guide me through the correct steps required to create a Material Document using this BO interface?
If possible, it would be very helpful if you could also share sample logic or reference code for the creation process.

Thank you in advance for your support.

entry.title: CDS View Slow Due to Association with C_StsObjActiveStatusCodeText
entry.content:
C_StsObjActiveStatusCodeText  this CDS is time taking (4minutes). its impact the performance 

Number of records 22million.

Why does this CDS view take several minutes to load even when the other association table is empty?

Does the association expand into a join causing a scan on C_StsObjActiveStatusCodeText?

What is the recommended way to optimize this (filtered CDS, index, explicit join, etc.)?

Any best practices for associations to large standard status tables?

Any help or guidance on how to optimize this CDS view or understand why it's slow would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: Link and correlation between BOI's and API's, differences in functionality and testing tools
entry.content:
Hi all,

We are developing in a S/4 Public Cloud environment (using embedded steampunk or ABAP cloud).

As part of the developments ahead, we need to "rebuild" classic developments, which use commonly known BAPIs such as BAPI_GOODSMVT_CREATE, which are not allowed in Public cloud, based on clean core principles.

As we move forward in research of the new ways, we found out (based on the Material Document example):

- There's a Material Document Business Object: Material Document

- There's a Material Document Business Object Interface (BOI), which is intended to be used for LOCAL (embedded) RAP developments as the ones we need: MaterialDocument / I_MATERIALDOCUMENTTP

- There's a Material Document API, which is intended to be used for SIDE-BY-SIDE (from BTP) or consumed from OUTSIDE S/4 (not the majority of our current scenarios): API_MATERIAL_DOCUMENT_SRV

We also found out, while both are present and documented on Business Accelerator Hub, the API one is far more documented and friendly for a functional analyst, including even a Try-Out section to test it with data. Which is very useful as it is needed to elaborate functional specs including test cases.

This poses a problem since what we will end up using from ABAP code (by EML) is the BOI, not the API. Some people already posted in regards to this, having problems because they are not in sync in functionality or capabilities: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/functional-differences-between-boi-s-and-api-s/qaq-p/13879790 https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/how-to-call-public-cloud-sap-api-from-embedded-steampunk/qaq-p/13725569

In analogy to the classic approach, the analyst was able to test the BAPIs from SE37 with data, and even save test cases to be used by reference for the developer.

Since we have no similar tool for BOIs, how we can assure and correlate the API and the BOI? Is there a 1:1 equivalence listing? Are there any plans for a BOI testing tool similar to the one provided for APIs?

Thank you!

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: RAP Action Updates Database, But Fiori UI Doesn‚Äôt Refresh Automatically ‚Äì Requires Manual "Go" Click
entry.content:
I‚Äôm working on a Fiori application built with the RAP (RESTful Application Programming) model, and I‚Äôve run into a behavior that‚Äôs puzzling me.

 

I have a custom action defined in my CDS behavior (e.g., submit) that:

  • Reads data from a staging table,
  • Processes it,
  • Calls an external service,
  • And updates the status field in the underlying database table (via MODIFY ENTITIES ... IN LOCAL MODE in the behavior handler).

    ‚ùå However, the Fiori UI (List Report page generated by Fiori Elements) does NOT reflect the updated status immediately after the action completes.

    ‚û°Ô∏è Only after I manually click the "Go" button (which triggers a full OData reload) do the updated records appear.

    My question:

    How can I make the UI automatically refresh after my RAP action successfully updates the data?

entry.title: RAP Fiori Elements app shows on create Zero GUID instead of value help text
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a RAP Fiori Elements App in SAP_BASIS 757.

I have a guid for a DC in my table and a value help for that. The value help works as expected and the reading text is shown in the field on the object page. BUT if I create a new record I initially see the zero guid '0000000-0000...' in the field until I select a DC from the value help. The guid is raw(16).

In my Root View I have an association:

association [0..1] to ZC_DISTR_CNTR_VH as _dc on $projection.DcNonMerchandise = _dc.DCKey


The related attributes in the root view are defined:

      @Consumption.valueHelpDefinition: [{
        entity: {
          name: 'ZC_DISTR_CNTR_VH',
          element: 'DCKey'
        }
      }]
      @ObjectModel.text.association: '_dc'
      @ObjectModel.text.element: ['DcNonMerchandiseText']
      @ui.textArrangement: #TEXT_ONLY      
      @EndUserText.label: 'Non Merchandise DC'
      dc_non_merchandise    as DcNonMerchandise,

      @ui.hidden: true
      _dc.DCId              as DcNonMerchandiseText,

The view for the value help:

define view entity ZC_DISTR_CNTR_VH
  as select distinct from ZI_DISTR_CNTR as dist
  association [1..1] to ZI_DSPDTREL as _dspdtrel on dist.ext_loc_id = _dspdtrel.dc_merchandise
{
      @ui.hidden: true
      @EndUserText.label: 'Distribution Center'
      @search.defaultSearchElement: true
      @search.fuzzinessThreshold: 0.8
      @ObjectModel.text.element: ['DCId']
      @ui.textArrangement: #TEXT_ONLY
      @search.ranking: #HIGH
  key loc_id                         as DCKey,
      @Consumption.filter.hidden: true
      @EndUserText.label: 'Distribution Center'
      @search.defaultSearchElement: true
      @search.fuzzinessThreshold: 0.8
      @Semantics.text: true
      @search.ranking: #HIGH
      cast( ext_loc_id as werks_d)   as DCId, 

      @ui.hidden: true
      _dspdtrel.dispo_date_relevance as DspDtRel
} 
where
  loc_tcd = '1002'

 It would be great, if anyone has an idea why this 0000-0000 is coming up.

Thanks in advance!

Roger

entry.title: how divested consolidation unit is not coming in group data analysis sap fiori app
entry.content: How divested consolidation unit is not coming in group data analysis and group data analysis with reporting sap fiori app. In cds C_CnsldtnRpt30Q, C_CnsldtnRpt40Q and cds P_CnsldtnGroupJrnlEntrItm there are no such checks related to divesture. Table fincs_grpstr is used no where in cds as this table field LYEAR and LPERI fields related to divesture. So how exactly consolidation units which are divested are not coming. What is the logic behind this?

entry.title: CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR while sending GET Request to ODATA v4 with /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am trying to create ODATA V4 as mentioned in SAP Note 2485370, So I created a custom entity in Eclipse and also a Class with below method implemented from interface /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC. 

@EndUserText.label: 'ZSAMPLE_SERVICE'
@ObjectModel.query.implementedBy: 'ABAP:ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'
define custom entity ZSAMPLE_SERVICE
{
   key component_material : abap.char(40);
       fg_material  : abap.char(40);
       fg_material_descr : abap.char(40);
  
}

And Class as below

CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  inheriting from /iwbep/cx_gateway
  FINAL
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    INTERFACES /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.



CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_REFERENCE.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~DELETE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_ACTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_FUNCTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY.

    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.


    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TS_DATA ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY_LIST.
    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service,
          TT_DATA TYPE TABLE OF zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.
    APPEND TS_DATA TO TT_DATA.
    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TT_DATA[] ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA_LIST.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~UPDATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

After this, I created service definition to explose above cds entity and then service binding.

When I do Get request to my service URL from postman I am  getting dump saying as below

Error analysis                                                                                    |
|    The application has indicated exception "CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR" as the                |
|     reason for the                                                                               |
|    termination:                                                                                  |
|    Processing was aborted because of an application modeling error: See previous                 |
|    in exception chain.                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "LCX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_BAD_IMPLMNT" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECM00J". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error occurred during execution of query provider 'ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'                        |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "CX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_CONSTRUCTION" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error during construction of the Unmanaged Query Provider for entity                          |
|    ZSAMPLE_SERVICE                                                                               |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception "CX_SY_CREATE_OBJECT_ERROR"                |
|     that occurred in                                                                             |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 3 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Could not create object; reference variable does not match specified class                    |
|    ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE.

Can anyone help on this?

I appreciate your time and reply on this query.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: RAP DETERMINATION handler METHOD stuck in Infinite recursive calls to itself because of MODIFY EML
entry.content:
Hello Gurus,

The issue we are facing is exactly the same as,

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/determination-on-save-infinite-loop-issue-rap/qaq-p/12784660

and unfortunately we had to go with the same workaround, which doesn't seems to be legit approach. And as mentioned over one of the comments there, I also have the same concern,

Details of the issue we are facing : 

Below 3 fields are part of the RAP BO we have,

In the Behavior Definition we have maintained a DETERMINATION for the OnHoldQuantity field changes as shown below,

// determination set_allocation_status on save { update; create; field Allocation_In_hand, status; }

  determination set_allocation_status on save { update; create; field OnHoldQuantity; }

And below is the Implementation of this DETERMINATION handler METHOD set_allocation_status.

It can be noted that as part of this MODIFY EML we are modifying only allocation_in_hand and status fields of the Entity.

But once the Execution Control reaches this MODIFY EML, again it calls back the DETERMINATION code which we have maintained for OnHoldQuantity field and this cycle continues indefinitely. 

Even though we fixed this issue as per the workaround mentioned in the referenced thread, buy making use of a Helper Class with a Static Attribute which acts as a flag for the MODIFY action executed at first place. 

But, this doesn't seem to be a legit workaround and rather I guess we need to have some Syntax addition using which we can tell the system that it should be executed only once.

Equally Strange is that even though the DETERMINATION is set for OnHoldQuantity field and in the MODIFY EML we are changing other fields still this DETERMINATION meant for OnHoldQuantity field is getting triggered.

If I am missing anything here, requesting to pour in your thoughts.

Helpful suggestions much appreciated.

Thanks,

Sijin

entry.title: Failed to get service instance URL error
entry.content: is there a workaround for this error? i have a new trail account and installed the latest 2025 eclipse, Service key generated from trail account is erroring out. Help me with the steps to fix this one. Thanks.

entry.title: Deploy RAP Application to SAP Rise
entry.content:
Dear All

We are having SAP Rise ( Private Cloud ) and want to deploy a RAP application directly using Eclipse or Visual Studio. Is there any possibility to skip the cost of Business Application Studio and to deploy a RAP application directly over SAP Rise System rather than deploying it on BTP cloud foundry.

Secondly as Rise system is accessible only through VPN, how the deployed App will be accessed by users through Mobile in field and retail stores.

If deployment of custom RAP App over BTP is the only option and deployment over Rise system is not possible. Do we need licenses of SAP Build Work Zone and SAP Start to access the App deployed over SAP BTP, and how the BTP will be accessing the services as system is only accessible through VPN.

entry.title: ODBC for ABAP error returning Non-ASCII characters
entry.content:
Hi,

have been trying out the ODBC for ABAP connector on ABAP Cloud Trial 2023SP00 on Linux.

Created a CDS view that exposes SBOOK. When retrieving the data I receive non-ASCII codes which result in errors in Excel and other ODBC consumers.

I tried changing the Charset property in odbc.ini but no change.

Any suggestion of why I am not receiving UTF-8 which I think is the default?

Cheers

Ignacio 

Ps: Tests with ODBCforABAP on Windows with Excel for data consumption. No errors.

Checked locale on Linux which is en_US.UTF-8

You were successfully authenticated, but an error occurred during the Service Instance logon. Please ensure that your user has the appropriate roles.

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/sap-btp-abap-environment-and-adt-troubleshooting-guide/ba-p/13527967

entry.title: RAP events feasibility after advance event mesh available for client
entry.content: We have implemented Restful application programming (RAP) for delivery business objects and it is working as expected. Now AEM (Advance event mesh) will be available in client landscape. So we need to know what kind of retrofitting we need to do when the RAP solution is working with AEM. Please suggest some sap links which can be useful to understand the basic of advance event mesh.
